antgame.core

Class Ant

  • java.lang.Object
    • antgame.core.Ant

  • public class Ant
extends java.lang.Object
    A simple ant model. Which can set markers, pick food, move cells.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Doniyor Ulmasov (13158)
